summary: A tough detective who is part of an elite New York City unit is trying to find out who killed his partner, but uncovers a plot to kidnap mobsters for money.
cast: Roy Scheider|Victor Arnold|Jerry Leon|Ken Kercheval|Tony Lo Bianco|Larry Haines|Richard Lynch|Bill Hickman|Lou Polan|Matt Russo|Joe Spinell|Robert Burr|Rex Everhart|David Wilson|Ed Jordan|Mary Multari|Frank Macetta|Frances Chaney|Mike Treanor|Benny Marino|Bill Funaro|Billy Longo|Ace Alagna|Sheldon Adler|Adeline Leonard Seakwood|Edward F. Carey|John Aprea|Geoffrey J. Felder|Sonny Grosso|Randy Jurgensen|Thomas Rand|Roger Serbagi|William Shust|Tom Signorelli|Louis Yaccarino
title: Los implacables, patrulla especial
